text: Ivarkalukku munnirunta nuhvutaiya camutayam, atu, samututaiya camutayam iprahim utaiya camutayam matyan vacikal, talaikilayp purantupona urar akiyavarkalin varalaru avarkalitam varavillaiya? Avarkalukku (nam anuppiya) avarkalukkuriya (irai) tutarkal telivana attatcikalai kontu vantarkal; (tutarkalai nirakarittatinal avarkal alintanar.) Allah avarkalukku oru tinkum ilaikkavillai eninum avarkal tamakkut tame tinkilaittuk kontarkal
